resources.string: State Password is used to show you your real password. Instead of randomly Generated String.
This app will help you to keep track of your passwords. This app Do Not require any Internet connection and so your passwords are save in your Mobile itself. This app is very simple to Use.
First, Click on the + icon on the top of the app bar.\nStep 2: Enter the Label, Id and the Password and That\'s It.\n(The maximum length of password and Id is 32 Character.)

Enter Your Master Password and then click on the Lock icon on the Password to your login Credential. If you haven\'t enter the correct master password then you\'ll get random Login Id and Password. That\'s It.
Generate a Unique password in Generate password tab.
Please set Up a master password to start using the App. \nNote that if the master Password is lost then the data cannot be recover.
Enter the Label and the Account ID/Address.
Tap multiple times to generate unique passwords of different type and length.
Anyone can login with wrong password.
